card.text: When this Junk enters, tap target creature and put a stun counter on it. {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Broken Find
card.text: When this Junk enters, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Stolen Find
card.text: When this Junk enters, you may discard a card. If you do, create a tapped Treasure token. {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Massive Find
card.text: When this Junk enters, target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn. {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Junklord Vorrick
card.text: Menace Whenever Junklord Vorrick enters or attacks, create a Junk token. Then you may sacrifice three artifacts. If you do, Junklord Vorrick deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Rippen, the Scarred
card.text: Hoot n' Holler — Whenever Rippen, the Scarred or a Vehicle he crewed this turn attacks, you may pay {X}, where X is Rippen's power. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Rippen.

card.name: Merc Squad
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 red Mercenary creature token with haste. That token must attack this turn if able. During your turn, Mercenaries you control get +1/+0 for each other Mercenary you control.

card.name: Smelting Pit
card.text: Players can't gain life. Whenever an opponent sacrifices an artifact, Smelting Pit deals 2 damage to that player. {1}, {T}: Each player creates a Junk token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.")

card.name: Marus, Calculated Killer
card.text: When Marus, Calculated Killer enters, create Louie, a legendary 3/3 black Construct artifact creature. Whenever you attack, target token creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Willing Offerings
card.text: Call The Beast. Then you gain life equal to the total number of creature cards in your graveyard and that you own in exile. (You get a Call The Beast emblem if you don't have one. You may mill three cards. Then choose one of the emblem's abilities.)

card.name: VAL, Automated Locomotive
card.text: First strike, vigilance, trample, indestructible Tap six untapped creatures you control: Put X +1/+1 counters on VAL, where X is the total power of creatures tapped this way. VAL becomes an artifact creature. Activate only as a sorcery and only once. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Toxic-Tail Bot
card.text: When this creature dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Ghastly Scrapbeast
card.text: Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, this creature gains menace until end of turn. {2}{G}: This creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery and only once each turn.

card.name: Rig Sparks
card.text: Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token. Rig Sparks deals 1 damage to any target. Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

card.name: Shiny Taker
card.text: Menace Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player's library. Until end of turn, you may cast that card and mana of any type can be spent to cast it.

card.name: Lost Sea Watcher
card.text: Flash When this creature enters, choose a creature card name that isn't Lost Sea Watcher. Return all creatures with the chosen name to their owner's hands. Creature spells with the chosen name can't be cast.

card.name: Disassemble
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target enchantment. • Exile target card from a graveyard.

card.name: Machines Rule the World
card.text: When this enchantment enters, create two 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens. Whenever one or more creatures you control enter, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature and each Vehicle you control. Artifact creatures and Vehicles you control gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Processing Point
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell during your turn, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token. {2}{W}: Scry 1.

card.name: Pulsing Hedron
card.text: Whenever you call The Beast, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn. {3}{U}, {T}: Call The Beast. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Dreams of Progress
card.text: Choose two — • Destroy all creatures. • Each player discards their hand, then draws a card for each card they discarded this way. • Return up to two target Vehicle cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. • Opponents can't cast noncreature spells until your next turn.

card.name: Dreams of Exploitation
card.text: Choose two — • Destroy target creature with mana value 3 or less. • Target opponent discards two cards unless they discard an artifact card. • Create two 2/2 black Zombie artifact creature tokens with "This creature can't block." • Return target artifact or creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Towering Killbot
card.text: Deathtouch When this creature enters, up to one other target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards you own in exile. You gain X life. At the beginning of your end step, call The Beast.

card.name: The Junklords Gambit
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. Put a charge counter on The Junklord's Gambit. {4}, {T}, Exile The Junklord's Gambit: Exile each nonland permanent with mana value equal to or less than the number of charge on this artifact. Then if there were ten or more charge counters on this artifact you win the game. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Garoth's Sentries
card.text: Reach Deathtouch

card.name: Acidic Acolyte
card.text: When this creature enters, destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls. When this creature dies, call The Beast. (You get a Call The Beast emblem if you don't have one. You may mill three cards. Then choose one of the emblem's abilities.)

card.name: Pit-Burster Mech
card.text: Menace Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If you control three or more artifacts, put two +1/+1 counters on it instead.

card.name: Bulked Guardian
card.text: Trample Whenever one or more other artifacts you control enter, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Puck WGJ
card.text: Vigilance

card.name: Armored Goliath
card.text: Vigilance When this creature enters, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Plainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Flamethrower Battle-Wagon
card.text: When this Vehicle enters, it deals 2 damage to any target. Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Unyielding Husk
card.text: This creature enters tapped. You may cast this card from your graveyard by sacrificing an artifact in addition to its other costs.
